title: Settings Menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Settings menu
custom_expected: THEN the user will see Experience Override

title: Experience Override
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Settings menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Experience Override
custom_expected:
THEN the menu will dismiss
AND the user will be on the Override Experience page

title: Page Layout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Experience Override page
custom_steps: WHEN a user views the Experience Override page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a header with MLB logo
AND Experience Override header
AND Add section with plus sign, OktaId box, Email box, Client Type dropdown, Experience dropdown
AND Export button that is clickable
AND table with headers of OktaId, Email, Client Type, Experience
AND each row of populated data will have Edit icon and Delete icon
AND bottom of the page has Rows Per Page dropdown filter (25, 50, 100)
AND Table Pagination

title: Search  - Customer OktaID
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Experience Override page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views the Experience Override page
AND types a OktaID into the search
custom_expected: THEN the results will filter by that OktaId

title: Search - Customer Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Experience Override page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views the Experience Override page
AND types a Email into the search
custom_expected: THEN the results will filter by that Email

title: Search - Client Type
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Experience Override page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views the Experience Override page
AND types a Client Type into the search
custom_expected: THEN the results will filter by that Client Type

title: Search - Device
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Experience Override page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user views the Experience Override page
AND types a Device into the search
custom_expected: THEN the results will filter by that Device

title: Update - Switch from MLB to Legacy
Update - Switch from MLB to Legacy
Update - Switch from Legacy to MLB
Access Control - Read & Write
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Admin, Dev, CS access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Settings menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Experience Override
custom_expected: THEN the user will have read and write access to Experience Override

title: Access Control - Read
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has access than Admin, Dev, CS access to Operator Tooling
AND the user is logged in
AND on the Settings menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on Experience Override
custom_expected: THEN the user will have read access to Experience Override

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Dark Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game stream is available for a game (live or archive)
AND the setting is set to Dark Mode Enabled
custom_steps: WHEN a Logger clicks on the the game to open Logger Page
custom_expected: THEN the media controls buttons are visible to the user

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Light Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game stream is available for a game (live or archive)
AND the setting is set to Dark Mode Disabled
custom_steps: WHEN a Logger clicks on the the game to open Logger Page
custom_expected: THEN the media controls buttons are visible to the user

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Stay Live Enabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND “Stay live” enabled
custom_expected:
Then the Logger will see 
Mute/unmute - Enabled
Set volume - Enabled
Mute - Enabled
Seek back in the media timeline - Disabled
Turn subtitles on/off - Enabled
Play/Pause - Disabled

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Stay Live Disabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND “Stay live” disabled
custom_expected:
Then the Logger will see
Play/Pause button - Enabled
Seek back in the media timeline - Enabled
Mute/unmute - Enabled
Set volume - Enabled
Turn subtitles on/off - Enabled

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Jump To Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND “Stay live” disabled
AND media is behind the live point
AND a Logger toggles Stay Live to enabled
custom_expected: The media should jump to live point and stay at/near live point.

title: Logger Page - Media Controls - Archives
custom_preconds: GIVEN a stream is done and archived
custom_steps: WHEN a Logger clicks on the game with the archive stream
custom_expected:
Then the Logger will see
Play/Pause button - Enabled
Seek back in the media timeline - Enabled
Mute/unmute - Enabled
Set volume - Enabled
Turn subtitles on/off - Enabled

title: Logger Page - Ad Break Type Reset - Duration
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND selects an ad event type other than “None”
AND selects a short ad duration
AND clicks start an ad then lets the end “naturally”
custom_expected: THEN ad event type selection should be reset to “None”

title: Logger Page - Ad Break Type Rest - End Ad Break
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND selects an ad event type other than “None”
AND selects a short ad duration
AND clicks start an ad break
AND clicks to end an ad break
custom_expected: THEN ad event type selection should be reset to “None”

title: Logger Page - Ad Blocker
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND an ad blocker is installed and enabled
custom_expected:
THEN the Logger can access the logger view for a game 
AND the Logger can start/stop ads and drop/lift slates
AND not see ad playback - just see Commercial Break in Progress slate

title: Logger Page - AD Line Model
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND clicks on the AD Phone button
custom_expected:
THEN a model appears
AND column headers Network, Number, Code are displayed
AND information is not empty

Check all teams (HD, AD, ND)

title: Logger Page - Dismiss AD Line Model
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND clicks on the AD Phone button
AND AD Phone model is displayed
AND a Logger clicks off the the model
custom_expected:
THEN the AD Phone model is dismissed
AND the Logger has access to the buttons on the Logger view

title: Logger Page - Ad Duration Dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND clicks on Ad Duration dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the Logger will see 
15 second intervals up to 180 seconds
60 second intervals from 180 - 600 seconds

title: Logger Page - Stream Start w/ Pre Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND stream just started
custom_expected:
THEN a Logger will see Pre-Game button selected with a check
AND currently view the backhaul
AND see Stayed Tuned slate
AND no audio (muted)

title: Logger Page - Pre Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND when pre-game show starts 
AND user clicks Pre-game button
custom_expected:
THEN a Logger will see the slate is lifted
AND hear audio from the source (unmuted
AND the feed is pre-game feed (fronthaul) 
AND see an Alert popup - green Success for state switch 
AND see an Alert popup - orange Warning for bh->fh switch

title: Logger Page - Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND game is about to start
AND click on the Game button
custom_expected:
THEN a Logger will see the feed goes to PROGRAM (backhaul)
AND see an Alerts popup - green Success for state switch 
AND see an Alert popup - orange Warning for fh->bh switch

title: Logger Pager - Post Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game stream is running
custom_steps:
WHEN a Logger is on the Logger page
AND game is over
AND post game is about to start
AND click on the Post-game button
custom_expected:
THEN a Logger will see the feed goes to Post Game (fronthaul)
AND see an Alerts popup - green Success for state switch
AND see an Alert popup - orange Warning for bh->fh switch
